title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 1 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 1 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Trump tax case is a big nothing, but meant to send a message, like the Mueller Report, years of investigation results in very minor charges and nothing on Trump himself. New York mayoral race lawsuits. Cosby case: Not guilty, but not innocent. Trump: You gotta keep fighting. Details of the indictment of Trump CFO on Mickey Mouse tax code charges. Prosecutors can get anyone on tax evasion if they want to send a message. Trump Derangement Syndrome: Is the left poking the bear, fueling Trump to run again?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
